short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy Redbubble Tags with a single click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this extension to copy all tags on any REDBUBBLE product easily and with a single click!

The Redbubble Tag Grabber is an extension that allows you to copy tags that are separated by commas, which means you can directly paste them in your product, without the worries of formatting them first. 

The extension adds a "Copy Tags" button right underneath the Product Tags section. You can simply click that button and it will copy all the tags right away!
